title: uNmai arindavar
sahitya:
caraNam 1uNmai arindavar unnaik-kaLippArO mAyaiyE manat-tiNmai uLLOrai nI sheivadum onruNDO mAyaiyE
 caraNam 2    ettanai kOTi paDai koNDu vandAlum mAyaiyE nI cittat-teLivenum tIyin mun nirppAyO mAyaiyE
 caraNam 3    ennaik-keduppadark-keNNamuTrAi keTTa mAyaiyE nAn unnaik-keDuppadu urudiyenrE uNar mAyaiyE
 caraNam 4    shAgattuNiyil samuddiram emmaTTum mAyaiyE inda dEham poi enru Nar dhIrarai en sheivAi mAyaiyE
 caraNam 5    irumai azhindapin engiruppAi arppa mAyaiyE teLindorumai kaNDAr munnadu ODAdu nirppAyO mAyaiyE
 caraNam 6    nI tarum inbattai nErenru koLvEnO mAyaiyE singam tAi tarak-koLLumO nallara kATSiyE mAyaiyE
 caraNam 7    enniccai koNDunai veTriviDa vallEnmAyaiyE ini unniccai kondu enakkonrum varAdu kAN mAAyaiyE
 caraNam 8    yArkkum kuDiyallEn yAnenba tOrndanan mAyaiyE unran pOrkkanjuvEnO poDiyAkkuvEn unnai mAyaiyE
